Hero.title:
All of Event Business,
in One Single Solution.
Hero.description:
Application, deposit verification, SMS, QR issuance, on-site check-in.
We consolidated tasks scattered across 5 tools into one unified system.

react.name: React & TS
react.detail: Seamless responsiveness even with high traffic

firebase.name: Firebase Auth
firebase.detail: Secure user data encryption and management

cloudflare.name: Cloudflare R2
cloudflare.detail: Instant loading of field photos and large files

Pipeline.title:
From Application to Settlement & Matching.
In One Flow.
Pipeline.description: Stop using Excel, SMS, and Google Forms separately. The system handles everything seamlessly from reception to result delivery.

form.label: Application
form.title: No-Code Form Builder
form.desc: Forget Google Forms. Build applications that fit your brand perfectly with drag & drop.

banking.label: Auto-Deposit Check
banking.title: Real-time Deposit Matching
banking.desc: Real-time verification of orders against actual bank transactions. Auto-approved in 1 second upon match.

admin.label: Admin Approval
admin.title: One-Click Approval & Filtering
admin.desc: Automatically filters blacklists, and schedules the next step (SMS sending) with a single approval button.

invite.label: Send Invite
invite.title: Personalized Invite Sending
invite.desc: Upon approval, AlimTalk/SMS with individual QR codes and entry guides are sent immediately.

event.label: On-site QR Entry
event.title: 1-Second QR Check-in
event.desc: Don't search for names on paper lists. Just scan the QR with a reader (phone) to verify attendance and launch the web app instantly.

result.label: Final Result/Match
result.title: Data Aggregation & Match Report
result.desc: After the event, rotation results and couple matching status are automatically generated.

Tools.sectionDesc: Dedicated tools prepared to perfectly execute business logic.

builder.title: Precision Custom Builder
builder.desc: Not just a simple form. Design complex data structures like rotation dating questions and 1:1 matching profiles without code.

qr.title: One-Pass QR System
qr.desc: From check-in to redirecting to session pages. Connect the participant's offline and online experience with a single QR scan.

dashboard.title: Real-time Operation Dashboard
dashboard.desc: Monitor and control participant attendance, ongoing round time, and matching vote status in real-time.

notification.title: Context-Based Auto-Notification
notification.desc: Approval SMS on deposit, reminder before party, matching result notification. Messages sent automatically fitting the context.

Benefits.sectionDesc:
Complex Excel, repetitive contacts, missing names...
Let the system handle it now.

automation.title: 0% Manual Work
automation.desc: From application check to deposit verification and guide SMS. All processes are automated seamlessly without human intervention.

accuracy.title: Zero Human Error
accuracy.desc: No more copy/paste mistakes in Excel. The system guarantees data integrity.

speed.title: 3 Hours â†’ 3 Seconds
speed.desc: Time taken for settlement after event close. Finished before you brew a cup of coffee.

custom.title: Custom Logic for You
custom.desc:
Don't force yourself into generic tools.
We design it exactly like your workflow, fitting like a tailored suit.

Comparison.title: Tailored Features for Every Service
Comparison.description: The system flexibly adapts to any type of gathering.

PremiumCTA.title:
Systematize Your Business,
Start Now.
PremiumCTA.description:
Manage events with hundreds of people solo,
and invest the saved time in planning and growth.

Dashboard.title:
From deposit check to participant management and SMS,
Done in a single click.
Dashboard.description:
Instantly processed with real-time auto-matching, no complex Excel work needed.
The system assists with auto-verification of deposits, profile checks, selection, and result notification.

FormBuilder.title:
Built-in Form Builder &
Auto Data Integration
FormBuilder.description:
Stop switching between Google Forms and Excel.
Design applications that fit your brand with our built-in builder,
and incoming data is instantly integrated into the management system in real-time.

QrSystem.title:
From Invitation to Entry,
Perfect Participant Experience
QrSystem.description:
Manage the entire participant journey with data, from branded invitations via SMS to detailed event guides.
On-site QR scan goes beyond simple attendance check, instantly connecting to a personalized web app in 1 second, maximizing immersion.
